name: HELP OUR PEOPLE FOR EDUCATION (HOPE) BAHU-UDESHIYA SANSTHA RAJURA

address: Care of Ekdant Provision, Bharat Chowk, Rajura, Ta : Rajura, Dist : Chandrapur

briefDescription: Man making is a Mission of HOPE…………With Dream, Vision and Passion HOPE has started its journey in June 2007 to serve rural India. Today HOPE have completed five years and achieved many milestones, but still a lot more to achieve. Thanks to Vision 2020 and PURA initiative by Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam who guided this group of young Indian to start HOPE.True in sense HOPE has extended help to more than 25 students of rural area. VIDYADEEP is a Solar Study Table lamp with zero maintenance, Flexible & movable, LED Lights which lasts for life time. In April Month HOPE distributed 21 VIDYADEEP to un-electrified students of 4 villages i.e. Sondo, Sidheshwar, Sonurli and Virur from Chandrapur district of Vidharbha for this initiative.

address: C/o Ekdant Provision, Bharat Chowk, Rajura, Ta : Rajura, Dist : Chandrapur
